item.title: 日本 "铁娘子 "对投资者的意义
item.description:
市场预计佐佐江-高市将继续安倍晋三的一些政策，在安倍晋三的领导下，日元走软，而股市则扶摇直上。【原文：

Markets expect Sanae Takaichi to continue some of the policies of Shinzo Abe, under whom the yen weakened while equities rocketed.

】

item.title: CPI升温不太可能阻止降息，上证500指数反弹—目前如此
item.description: 由于市场对美联储下周降息预期的乐观情绪占主导地位，股票交易者很可能对周五消费者物价指数报告中任何顽固通胀的证据视而不见。【原文：Equities traders are likely to shrug off any evidence of stubborn inflation in Friday’s consumer price index report, as the market narrative is dominated by optimism for an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next week.】

item.title: 台湾芯片业对绿色能源供应表示担忧
item.description: 台湾的芯片制造商对政府提供新的绿色电力供应计划的可行性感到担忧，从而对满足能源安全关切的努力产生了怀疑。【原文：Taiwan’s chipmakers are worried about the feasibility of a government plan to deliver new green power supplies, casting doubt over efforts to satisfy energy security concerns.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行首次 "软性政策 "利率总结令分析师意见分歧
item.description: 瑞士国家银行首次尝试提高其政策决定的透明度，这受到了寻求可能的降息和法郎干预线索的观察家们褒贬不一的欢迎。【原文：The Swiss National Bank’s first attempt to embrace more transparency over its policy decisions received a mixed welcome from observers seeking clues on possible interest-rate cuts and franc intervention.】

item.title: 中国在新发展规划中深化技术自力更生的努力
item.description: 中国发誓要在未来五年内实现技术自力更生和国内市场增长，因为中国希望使经济免受外国压力的影响，并建立一个可持续的增长引擎。【原文：China vowed to seek technological self-reliance and grow the domestic market in the next five years, as it looks to both insulate the economy from foreign pressures and build a sustainable engine for growth.】

item.title: 穆迪警告政治风险威胁土耳其经济收益
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，政治紧张局势有可能使土耳其回归正统政策所带来的经济收益付之东流，并警告说，新的动荡可能会使投资者感到不安，并使货币政策复杂化。【原文：Political tensions risk undoing the economic gains from Turkey’s return to orthodox policies, Moody’s Ratings said, warning renewed unrest may rattle investors and complicate monetary policy.】

item.title: 默克尔前顾问称，是时候让德国人担任欧洲央行行长了
item.description: 据德国总理安格拉-默克尔的一位前经济顾问称，当克里斯蒂娜-拉加德的欧洲央行行长任期于 2027 年底结束时，德国将最终获得欧洲央行的最高职位。【原文：Germany should finally get the top job at the European Central Bank when Christine Lagarde’s term as president ends in late 2027, according to a former economic adviser to Chancellor Angela Merkel.】

item.title: 索迪斯预测 2026 年增长放缓后暴跌
item.description: 索迪斯公司（Sodexo SA）股价创下七个月来最大跌幅，此前这家法国餐饮公司预测，由于结构性挑战依然存在，特别是在美国高等教育领域，2026 年的收入增长将放缓。【原文：Sodexo SA shares tumbled the most in seven months after the French catering company predicted a slowdown in revenue growth in 2026 as structural challenges remain, particularly in US higher education.】

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡党斥责对手的吞并法案为 "戏弄
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）的右翼竞争对手在议会一读中以微弱优势通过了一项兼并约旦河西岸的法案，这引起了美国的抗议，因为盟国正试图实施一项加沙和平计划，而该计划能否获得地区支持取决于是否承认巴勒斯坦的领土要求。【原文：Right-wing rivals of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu narrowly passed a West Bank annexation bill in a first parliamentary reading, drawing remonstration from the US as the allies try to implement a Gaza peace plan whose regional support hinges on acknowledging Palestinian territorial claims.】

item.title: 美国与猎户座组建关键矿产基金 目标 50 亿美元
item.description: 美国政府与 Orion Resource Partners 和阿布扎比的 ADQ 共同投资了一个新基金，用于投资关键矿产。【原文：The US government has invested in a new fund to invest in critical minerals alongside Orion Resource Partners and Abu Dhabi’s ADQ.】

item.title: Castellum 新任首席执行官称，情况在好转之前还会更糟
item.description: Castellum AB 的首席执行官 Pal Ahlsen 表示，市场形势严峻，空置率不断上升，情况可能会先恶化后好转。【原文：Castellum AB’s Chief Executive Officer Pal Ahlsen said it will probably get worse before it gets better, pointing to a tough market and increasing vacancy rates.】

item.title: 世界为何开始对冲美元风险
欧洲一级债券市场出现 6 月以来首笔撤单交易
item.description: 欧洲一级债务市场自今年夏天以来首次出现取消债券交易的情况，这也是全年创纪录交易中罕见的瑕疵。【原文：Europe’s primary debt market has just logged its first canceled bond deal since the summer — a rare blemish on what’s been a record-breaking run all year.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行认为政策设置将适时刺激通胀
item.description: 瑞士国家银行官员上月决定不降息，他们认为瑞士的货币政策足以在未来几个季度刺激通胀。【原文：Swiss National Bank officials decided against an interest-rate cut last month, assessing their monetary stance to be stimulative enough to stoke inflation in coming quarters.】

item.title: 日本的电力供应保障计划可能会抑制市场流动性
item.description: 据本周参加一系列行业活动的交易商和官员称，日本政府旨在稳定电力供应的建议有可能影响全球增长最快的电力市场之一的流动性。【原文：Japanese government proposals aimed at stabilizing electricity supplies run the risk of impacting liquidity in one of the world’s fastest-growing power markets, according to traders and officials attending a series of industry events this week.】

item.title: Nexperia 警告日本汽车制造商供应不再有保障
item.description: Nexperia 公司通知其日本汽车客户，该公司可能无法再保证供应，这再次引发了人们对这家荷兰芯片制造商的动荡导致全球供应链受阻的担忧。【原文：Nexperia notified its Japanese automotive customers that it may no longer be able to guarantee supply, triggering renewed concern about upheaval at the Dutch chipmaker snarling global supply chains.】

item.title: 普利司通任命森田为首席执行官，负责恢复增长
item.description: 普利司通公司（Bridgestone Corp.）任命森田康弘（Yasuhiro Morita）为首席执行官，接替石桥秀一（Shuichi Ishibashi），目标是到 2031 年重新夺回全球第一大轮胎制造商的地位。【原文：Bridgestone Corp. named Yasuhiro Morita as chief executive officer to succeed Shuichi Ishibashi, with a stated aim to reclaim its position as the world’s No. 1 tiremaker by 2031.】

item.title: 法国 10 月商业信心指数意外走高
item.description: 受制造业和零售业改善的推动，法国 10 月份的商业信心指数意外走高。【原文：French business confidence unexpectedly inched higher in October, driven by improvements in the manufacturing and retail sectors.】

item.title: 日本工会在即将举行的薪酬谈判中寻求至少 5%的工资涨幅
item.description: 日本最大的工会联合会将在明年的工资谈判中继续寻求至少 5%的工资涨幅，因为新首相高市真奈试图保持日本的工资增长势头。【原文：Japan’s largest labor union federation will keep seeking at least a 5% wage hike in next year’s pay talks, as new Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi attempts to keep the country’s wage momentum going.】

item.title: 美国关税损害货运市场，DSV 警告将进一步削减成本
item.description: 全球最大的货运代理公司 DSV A/S 下调了利润预期区间的上限，并表示由于关税开始对运输市场造成损害，该公司可能不得不进一步削减成本。【原文：DSV A/S, the world’s largest freight forwarder, lowered the top end of its profit forecast range and said it may have to make deeper cost cuts as tariffs are starting to hurt the transport market.】

item.title: 北美强劲的消费需求提升了联合利华的销售额
item.description: 受发达市场（尤其是北美）需求强劲和公司节约成本努力的推动，联合利华公司第三季度的销售额增幅超过预期。【原文：Unilever Plc sales rose more than expected in the third quarter, driven by strong demand in developed markets, particularly North America, and the company’s cost-saving efforts.】

item.title: 中国找到代价高昂的新方法来扩展习近平的全球人民币政策
item.description: 中国正在利用其世界最大债权国的地位，帮助扩大人民币的使用范围，为海外借款人提供机会，让他们通过放弃美元，从国内经济低迷的利率中获益。【原文：China is leveraging its position as the world’s largest creditor to help broaden usage of the yuan, offering overseas borrowers the chance to benefit from economically-depressed interest rates at home by ditching the dollar.】

item.title: 报告称南非面临空中交通管制员危机
item.description: 南非空中交通管制人员短缺，"几乎影响到 "管理国家空域的国有公司 "提供的服务"。【原文：South Africa’s shortage of air-traffic controllers is “almost compromising service delivery” by the state-owned company that manages the nation’s airspace.】

item.title: 英镑下跌，富时 100 指数期货持稳
印尼改变策略，争取银行增加贷款，促进经济增长
item.description: 印尼央行正在改变支持经济的策略，这表明货币政策正在失效。【原文：Bank Indonesia is changing tack in its bid to support the economy, signaling that monetary policy is failing to deliver.】

item.title: 必和必拓不顾 CMRG 限制向中国买家出售铁矿石货物
item.description: 本周，必和必拓集团向中国贸易商出售了几批铁矿石货物，尽管与中国强大的国有买家之间的争端有可能干扰这家全球最大矿商向其主要市场发货。【原文：BHP Group sold several iron ore cargoes to Chinese traders this week, despite a dispute with the nation’s powerful state buyer that risks disrupting shipments from the world’s largest miner to its main market.】

item.title: 诺基亚因网络增长利润超过预期
item.description: 得益于网络基础设施和光网络业务的增长，诺基亚公司第三季度调整后利润超出预期。【原文：Nokia Oyj’s adjusted profit for the third quarter beat estimates, thanks to growth in its network infrastructure and optical networks businesses.】

item.title: 空客、莱昂纳多和泰雷兹达成合并卫星业务协议
item.description: 莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）、空中客车公司（Airbus SE）和泰雷兹公司（Thales SA）达成了一项期待已久的协议，将合并它们的卫星业务，成立一家欧洲合资企业，希望与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）一较高下。【原文：Leonardo SpA, Airbus SE and Thales SA sealed a long-awaited agreement to merge their satellite operations and create a European joint venture that aspires to compete with Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 意法半导体（STMicro）销售额预测低于预期，芯片复苏停滞不前
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）预测第四季度营收不及分析师预期，加剧了市场对成熟半导体行业复苏停滞的担忧。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV forecast fourth-quarter revenue that missed analysts’ expectations, fueling concerns that the mature semiconductor industry’s recovery is stalling.】

item.title: 韩国房地产反弹不断，央行保持警惕
item.description: 韩国中央银行决定在等待政府住房措施冷却需求的同时不降低利率，这进一步增强了韩国房地产市场的反弹势头。【原文：South Korea’s property market rally gained further momentum, reinforcing a decision by the central bank to refrain from lowering interest rates as it waits for government housing measures to cool demand.】
